attributes.action: Freeze the Fees - end parking fees for hospital staff and patients in the Glasgow area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In November 2007, Glasgow City Council intends to impose crippling parking fees on all members of staff and patients at city hospitals. We find this to be unacceptable, and believe that it will impact negatively on the quality of life of fee-payers, and have a knock-on effect on our health services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
